plot: Richard Benjamin and Paula Prentiss give guidelines on when to call a meeting, how to prepare for it, how to establish leadership and how to stick to the agenda.
title: Managing Meetings
plot_es: Richard Benjamin and Paula Prentiss give guidelines on when to call a meeting, how to prepare for it, how to establish leadership and how to stick to the agenda.
plot_en: Richard Benjamin and Paula Prentiss give guidelines on when to call a meeting, how to prepare for it, how to establish leadership and how to stick to the agenda.
